name: LOCGame
description: LegendsOfCrypto (LOCG) is a new Collectible NFT Card Game on the blockchain where players can battle it out to win valuable tokens and NFT items. Leveraging Decentralized Finance and DAO governance, LOCG creates a sustainable, community-driven gaming experience. The game itself is centered around the crypto industry pop culture, with playable characters like a Market Maker, Whale, including Binanceâ€™s very own CZ and other key proponents. At the core of the Legends of Crypto ecosystem is the platform's native LOCG utility token.
